Text: Interest in Governmental Affairs Cc Shapiro I would like an opportunity to gain practical experience in the Governmental Affairs group you are heading up for Enron My background at Enron has lead me through two emerging companies Azurix and Enron Broadband Services both of which faced and are facing regulatory and legislative issues Currently I am rotating through the AnalystAssociate program in business development roles but have a strong desire to work for a group that helps shape our commercial deals I have been speaking with both Rocky Storie and Allison Navin about this area of Enron and I would appreciate it if I could meet with someone from your team in the Houston office Attached is a copy of my resume I am in the process of looking for my next rotation towards the end of this summer and would like to know if there are any opportunities within your group Regards Melanie King Enron Broadband Services office cell
